From enslavement to entrepreneur and civil rights leader. Barney Ford’s life is a testament to the resilience, ambition, and contributions of Black Coloradans.

That’s why Ruben Gallego and I have introduced legislation to set clear use-of-force standards, prioritize de-escalation, and make sure immigration enforcement protects public safety while respecting the law and human life.

Across the country, ICE raids are being carried out with excessive force, little transparency, and devastating consequences for families. When enforcement looks like a military operation and accountability is absent, people get hurt and trust in law enforcement breaks down.
The biggest fraud ever perpetrated in America:

Millions lost health care so Washington Republicans could give their rich friends yet another tax cut.

Donald Trump and JD Vance think that's a win.

I think it's a moral tragedy.

record.text:
It took the outcry of a nation to bring 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father back to Minnesota from an ICE detention facility, and now the Trump administration is trying to fast-track their deportations.

The cruelty of this administration has no limits.

Each day brings a new low from this disgraceful President.

Donald Trump is fully responsible for the racist post against the Obamas, apologizing shouldn’t even be a question.

Measles on the rise.
Masked agents in the street.
The President seizing ballots.

This is America under Donald Trump. We deserve better.

Talk doesn’t lower prices. Savings don’t happen by accident.

They happen when we fight and win.
